author: zongaro
msg: Patch for XALANJ-2175 reviewed by Sarah McNamara (mcnamara () ca ! ibm ! com).
A replacement version of Tidy.jar built (by Sarah) with the same version of
DOM and SAX APIs as are included in xml-apis.jar.  Without that the change,
the old version of those APIs included in Tidy.jar conflicted with the versions
included in xml-apis.jar and Java 5.0, preventing tests from running on that
